eLCS_Prediction module¶

Name: eLCS_Prediction.py Authors: Ryan Urbanowicz - Written at Dartmouth College, Hanover, NH, USA Contact: ryan.j.urbanowicz@darmouth.edu Created: November 1, 2013 Description: Given a match set, this module uses a voting scheme to select the phenotype prediction. Set up to handle both discrete and continuous phenotypes.

Also set up to try and handle prediction ties if possible.

algorithm published by Stewart Wilson (1995).

getDecision()[source]¶
